name: Cursed Roots
storyline:
An unexpected phone call with terrible news takes you back to your hometown after being away for many years.   
As you arrive at the house where you grew up, you are welcomed by an eerie and dark atmosphere. Things have changed and you barely recognize the place. The house is in decay, you feel that something is wrong and you are determined to find out what really happened during your time away.   
You will soon realize that things are not as they seem, but it's too late now, the main door behind you is locked and there is no way out... you will need to escape and survive the unspeakable horrors within the house!
summary: Cursed Roots is a horror point-and-click adventure game with action elements: you are trapped in an haunted house where nightmarish creatures dwell; you will need to think quickly and use/combine items to survive and escape: one wrong move, and it's game over!
